resources.string: GPS is needed for this app

string.name: menu_filter_by_distance
string.translation_description: The label for the menu item to filter the displayed venues by distance.

string.name: venue_detail_image_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the header / hero image that is show at the top of the venue detail screen.

string.name: my_venue_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'My venues' screen where the user can see the list of venues that have been added to their favorites.

string.name: venue_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the venue list screen where the user can see a list of venues available to add to their favorites.

string.name: venue_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the venue details screen where the user can see the details for a specific venue.

string.name: navigation_drawer_header_content_description
string.translation_description: Content description for the image that is shown at the top of the navigation drawer.

string.name: added_venue_to_favorites
string.translation_description: Confirmation text that is shown when a user adds a venue to their favorites.

string.name: favorites_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My Favorites' screen when no venues have been added to the user's favorites

string.name: planted_date
string.translation_description: Text with placeholders that indicates when the plant was planted. Example: 'Sunflower planted on May 24, 2018'.

string.name: menu_item_share_venue
string.translation_description: The label for the Share menu item

string.name: share_text_venue
string.translation_description: The default messaged used when sharing a venue on SNS, etc.

resources.string: Check out the %s in Andre\'s TravelDemoApp

string.name: a11y_venue_item_image
string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the venue images shown in the 'My Favorites' and 'Venue list' screens.
